data.name: Glide Account
data.description: Your day to day banking is about to get a lot simpler. Everything you need from your transaction account - easy and secure. No monthly account fee, No ATM fees, Works on all cashless payment platforms

bundles.name: Bonus Saver
bundles.description: Can be linked to Bonus Saver account.

features.additionalInfo: Stay flexible anywhere and anytime with the MyState Bank app.

features.additionalValue: Apple Pay, Google Pay, Samsung Pay, Fitbit Pay, Garmin Pay.

features.additionalInfo: Send and receive money in less than 60 seconds.
Send and receive money in less than 60 seconds. Add your mobile number or email address as a PayID and use this in place of your BSB and Account number.

Insights HubInsights takes your everyday account activity and turns it into helpful, personalised information about the way you use your money.It's like personal financial support in your pocket - everything you need to know to keep on top of your bills, manage your spending and maximise your opportunities to save.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The minimum age to open a transaction or savings account in person is 13 years or to open an account online is 16 years

fees.name: BPay Query Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged when you request a trace of a BPAY transaction.

fees.name: Cheques Deposited and Dishonoured
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged when a cheque, not your own, has been deposited in to your account and has been dishonoured by the other financial institution.

fees.name: Dishonour and Rejection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee will be debited to your account on the day of the dishonour or rejection. This fee is charged when any payment on your account is unable to be completed.

fees.name: Overdrawn Account Interest
fees.additionalInfo: Deposit accounts without overdraft arrangements must have a credit balance. We are under no obligation to honour cheques, or allow any withdrawal that would overdraw an account without an approved overdraft facility.If we honour a cheque or debit which overdraws an account, the amount overdrawn (referred to as the credit provided) will attract debit interest charged to the account on the last day of the calendar month. This interest which will be charged to your account as 'Overdraft Interest' is calculated on the daily closing debit balance using the current 'Unarranged Borrowing Rate' shown in the Fees & Charges Deposit Accounts. Any credit provided is short term credit and must be repaid within 7 days of being provided. In addition, Overdrawn Administration Fees will be applied.

fees.name: Overdrawn Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Per daily occurrence, for any savings or transaction account (with or without an pproved overdraft limit) where we honour a transaction that overdraws the account or exceeds the authorised overdraft limit.

fees.name: Stop Payment
fees.additionalInfo: A request that payment not be made on cheque written by you, but not yet presented. This fee will be charged if the cheque is presented. This fee also applies to direct debits, periodical payments, transfer orders and BPAY future payments if we receive a request to stop payment on a drawing.

fees.name: Transaction Verification Fee, Copy of Sales Voucher
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when we are requested to investigate a transaction. The fee will not be charged if we find that the transaction is incorrect.

fees.name: Foreign Currency Conversion
fees.additionalInfo: Visa International will convert all transactions made overseas on the Visa Debit Card into Australian dollars at the foreign exchange rate that applies on the day the transaction is processed by Visa International.A conversion fee of 3% of the value of the transaction is payable (of which 2% is payable to Cuscal Limited, the principal member of Visa International under which we provide Visa Debit Cards).

fees.name: Bank@Post withdrawal fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is debited on the last day of each month and is charged in addition to any electronic transaction fee which may apply.

depositRates.additionalInfo: No interest is paid on this account.
